meanings.definition: Relating to the act of interpreting or explaining something.
meanings.sent1: The interpretational task was challenging for the students.
meanings.sent2: Her interpretational skills helped clarify the confusing text.
meanings.sent3: The interpretational puzzle left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: His interpretational approach shed light on the complex issue.
meanings.sent5: The interpretational workshop provided valuable insights.

meanings.definition: Involving the process of understanding or making sense of something.
meanings.sent1: The interpretational process required careful analysis.
meanings.sent2: Their interpretational abilities were put to the test during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The interpretational mix-up led to a humorous misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: The interpretational breakthrough revolutionized the field.
meanings.sent5: His interpretational explanation was crystal clear.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the way in which something is perceived or understood.
meanings.sent1: The interpretational differences between cultures were fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The interpretational aspect of the painting intrigued art enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: Her interpretational dance routine brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The interpretational shift in public opinion was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The interpretational perspective offered a new angle on the issue.
